stopAutoWalkOnUIOpen.desc:: Set whether opening an UI should stop auto walking: default:false

stopOnEnteringWater.desc:: Set whether entering/leaving water should stop auto walking: default:false

stopOnPickBlock.desc:: Set whether picking a block(like creative mode middle mouse button) does stop auto walking: default:true

stopOnInteractWithBlock.desc:: Set whether interacting with a block(like opening a chest) does stop auto walking: default:true

stopOnInteractWithEntity.desc:: Set whether interacting with an entity(right clicking a villager, attacking a zombie) does stop auto walking: default:true

stopOnUsingItem.desc:: Set whether using an item(eating food, drawing bow etc) does stop auto walking: default:true

keepSprintActive.desc:: Set whether using an item(eating food, drawing bow etc) does stop auto walking: default:true

stopAfterInactiveSeconds.desc:: Set after how many seconds of inactivity auto walking gets disabled: default:30 seconds
